means: 遮盖，掩盖( cloak的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The beautiful sweeping coastline was cloaked in mist.
sentence.Network_cn: 美丽的海岸线一望无际，笼罩在迷雾之中。

sentence.Network_en: The organization is cloaked in a shroud of secrecy.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个组织笼罩着一种诡秘的气氛。

sentence.Network_en: The history of the family is cloaked in mystery.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个家族的家史披上了一层神秘的色彩.

PerfectNetExp.abs: he cloaked his evil purpose under friendly words ., 他用友好的语言来掩盖他罪恶的目的.
These inhumanities , she cloaked with her professionalism ., 她用职业的幌子隐藏自己的残酷无情.
He laid a light hand on Elias ' cloaked shoulder ., 他轻轻将手搭在 Elias 披着斗篷的肩头.
the history of the family is cloaked in mystery ., 这家族史披上一层神秘色彩.

list.abs: 摄魂怪的英文是什么？_百度知道 ... 魔杖 Wand 隐形衣 Invisibility Cloak 坩埚 Cauldron.
舞台英文术语 ... orchestra circle 楼下座位,正厅 cloak room 衣帽间 musicians' lounge 音乐家休息室.
生活常用英语单词_百度文库 ... three-quarter coat 中长大衣 dust coat 风衣 mantle,cloak 斗篷.
机械英语词汇|各类常用英语词汇 ... taper 锥拔 leather cloak 仿皮革 shiver 饰纹.

entry.def: A cloak is a long, loose, sleeveless piece of clothing which people used to wear over their other clothes when they went out.
A cloak of something such as mist or snow completely covers and hides something.

example.ex: Today most of England will be under a cloak of thick mist.
example.tran: 今天，英格兰大部分地区将被浓雾笼罩。

entry.def: If you refer to something as a cloak, you mean that it is intended to hide the truth about something.

example.ex: Preparations for the wedding were made under a cloak of secrecy...
example.tran: 婚礼的准备工作是秘密进行的。

entry.def: To cloak something  means to cover it or hide it.

example.ex: ...the decision to cloak major tourist attractions in unsightly hoardings...
example.tran: 在主要景点外挂满刺眼的大幅广告牌的决定

example.ex: A fire could have been deliberately started to cloak small coordinated troop movements...
example.tran: 可能是有人故意放火掩护小规模的部队协同行动。

means.word_mean: 1. having its true character concealed with the intent of misleading;
2. covered with or as if with clothes or a wrap or cloak;

auth_sentence.content: But the dawn of our lineage is cloaked in mystery.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the dawn of our lineage is cloaked in mystery.

auth_sentence.content: Niger, to the north, was cloaked in forests.

auth_sentence.content: Even digital self-expression needs to be safe, cloaked in anonymity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even digital self-expression needs to be safe, cloaked in anonymity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even digital self-expression needs to be safe, cloaked in anonymity.
